mapper.select: select count(*) from xm_zjbf t where 1=1 and xmbm=#{xmbm} and to_number(sbthcd)<=to_number(#{sbthcd})
select * from xm_zjbf t where id=#{id}

select distinct xmmc,nvl(dwzj,0) dwzj,nvl(dwcgs,0) dwcgs,nvl(dwrys,0) dwrys,nvl(dwtdk,0) dwtdk,nvl(dwdfzc,0) dwdfzc,nvl(dwttc,0) dwttc,nvl(bfzj,0) bfzj,nvl(yshbfzj,0) yshbfzj,nvl(jhxdzj,0) jhxdzj from xmjbxx xm left join (select xmbm,sum(ztz) dwzj,sum(cgs) dwcgs,sum(rys) dwrys,sum(ztz)-sum(cgs)-sum(rys)-sum(tdk)-sum(dfzc) dwttc,sum(tdk) dwtdk,sum(dfzc) dwdfzc from xm_zjdw where to_number(sbthcd)<=to_number(#{sbthcd}) group by xmbm) dw on xm.xmbm=dw.xmbm left join (select xmbm,sum(ztz) bfzj,sum(decode(shzt,'已审核',ztz,0)) yshbfzj from xm_zjbf where to_number(sbthcd)<=to_number(#{sbthcd}) group by xmbm) bf on xm.xmbm=bf.xmbm left join (select xmid xmbm,sum(nvl(ztz,0)) jhxdzj from xm_gsd_jhxd group by xmid) xd on xm.xmbm=xd.xmbm where xm.xmbm=#{xmbm}
mapper.insert:
insert into xm_zjbf
xmbm, ztz, cgs, gz, sz, zq, tdk, jl, qt, rys, dfzc, yhdk, stz, jhxdwh, bd, sbthcd, xsbzt, ssbzt, bfyf, ttc, tbr, tbsj, bz,
#{xmbm}, #{ztz}, #{cgs}, #{gz}, #{sz}, #{zq}, #{tdk}, #{jl}, #{qt}, #{rys}, #{dfzc}, #{yhdk}, #{stz}, #{jhxdwh}, #{bd}, #{sbthcd}, #{xsbzt}, #{ssbzt}, #{bfyf}, #{ttc}, #{tbr}, #{tbsj}, #{bz},
mapper.select: select count(*) from xm_zjbf t where 1=1 and gydwdm is not null ${gydwdm} and bfyf like '%'||#{bfyf}||'%'
select * from xm_zjbf where 1=1 and gydwdm=#{gydwdm} and bfyf=#{bfyf} and jhxdwh=#{jhxdwh}
mapper.insert:
insert into xm_zjbf
xsbzt,ssbzt,shzt, ztz, cgs, rys, ttc, dfzc, bd, bfyf, jhxdwh, parent, gydwdm, xmbm, bz, nf, tbr, tbsj,
'已上报','已上报','已审核', #{ztz}, #{cgs}, #{rys}, #{ttc}, #{dfzc}, #{bd}, #{bfyf}, #{jhxdwh}, #{parent}, #{gydwdm}, #{xmbm}, #{bz}, #{nf}, #{tbr}, #{tbsj},
mapper.select: select * from xm_zjbf z where bfyf=#{bfyf} and z.parent=#{gydwdm} and nf=#{nf} and jhxdwh=#{jhxdwh} order by gydwdm
select * from xm_zjbf z where bfyf=#{bfyf} and nf=#{nf} and jhxdwh=#{jhxdwh} and (z.parent=#{gydwdm} or gydwdm like rtrim(#{gydwdm}, '0')||'%') order by gydwdm
